data.ans: ((It's)) a ((great pleasure to be here today and to have in)) the ((studio with us Mr. Nishiyama)), ((who I think you know is)) one ((of Japan's most famous simultaneous interpreters)).
((I just couldn't for)) the ((life of me figure out what)) we're ((supposed to be doing)).
((Today's slightly shorter race could well help)) to ((tip the scales)) in ((his favor)).
